metadata.title: CVE-2018-10982 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.10.x allowing x86 HVM guest OSusers to cause a denial of service (unexpectedly high interrupt number,array overrun, and hypervisor crash) or possibly gain hypervisor privilegesby setting up an HPET timer to deliver interrupts in IO-APIC mode, akavHPET interrupt injection.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
